tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Highly recommended.The Doctor approach, staff behavior and ambience overall is so positive.Appointments are well managed and I'm surprised to see how less the waiting time is despite of the crowd.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
My frnd suggested Dr.Nivethetha last yr wen i was totally depressed for having baby.. I wasted two yrs for the treatment ..those drs simply prolonged the treatment duration and no effective result.. Also tey wer vry harsh wen we ask our doubts .. ... But Dr. Nivethitha is very humble and deal with the pt cheerfully.. She explains all the treatment plans and procedures clearly in a positive way which is vry important for the successful treatment according to me.. She treated my pcod problem ... Now we are blessed wit an little angel .
I personally recommend Dr. Nivethitha to all my frnds... Plz consult her for any gynec or infertility issues... Instead of wasting huge money in corporate hospitals do visit her for best result in treatment...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ************ *** ** *** ** *** **** ******* ** **** **** ** *******. When we enquired for an immediate check-up, she responded in chat and attended calls also. Usually, doctors won't pick up calls but she picked up and responded to our queries in WhatsApp also. When the doctor responds to each patient which is not an easy task. I  appreciate her patience and dedication to the patients. Her wait time is less than 15 minutes which is highly appreciated as well. Just want to say thank you so much to a wonderful compassionate doctor, Dr. Niveditha. You have a heart of gold and are the true meaning of what a doctor is supposed to be for the patient.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I'm the one of the patient to the Dr.niveditha. she is so friendly to the patient. Her speech is so soft,kind and polite. Whenever I'll call her she pick the phone immediately and response in a good manner. When we meet the doctor first time She explain the problem to the patient clearly and then only she started her treatment. In their clinic the good one is they keep following the patient whenever patient wants to meet doctor they remain us. They noticed the date which we want to meet the doctor next time. They will always remain us one day before and fix the appointment with time. I like her care and friendliness...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Very good clinician! She diagnosed my condition within minutes and logically explained it to me. Her in detail explanation and reassurance in itself solved half the problems by the time we left her clinic. With just a simple suggestion all my problems were sorted. Also, I could personally contact her anytime even for the smallest of issues. Her great team worked and communicated coordinately so that no one had to wait for a long time. 
Am already in my 4th month now and am looking forward to a great time during pregnancy and delivery with her guidance. 
Highly recommend to anyone with any infertility, obstretic or gynaecological issues.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your valuable feedback üëç

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: i went to this doctor for my temporary menstrual problem. i suppose to have my period on feb 4th unfortunately i was not. i went to this doctor. she was very friendly, listened to my problem, did the scanning. since it was just a normal delay , she gave me tablets for 5 days and told me after the tablets within 7 days I'll get my periods. i took the tablets regularly as per her instructions. Once i complete the medication, i waited for 4 days. after 4 days i got my periods. i really feel happy now. Very nice doctor. Friendly environment. Good staffs with kind attitude. Fees and medicines price are reasonable. I would recommend this clinic to anyone.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback üëç
